title: Twitter Clone
description: This is a simple Twitter clone website written in PHP, JavaScript with a MySQL database.

title: Quizzlet Prototype
description: This is a simple quiz website where user can add and take quizzes. This website backend uses Java EE such as JSP, JSF and MySQL database.

title: NBCC Staff Wellness App
description: This is a simple hybrid mobile application created with Expo, React Native and Nodejs server. This hybrid app will enable NBCC  staff to maintain their wellness.
